Service Configuration Management Process 
QMS/PR_SCM001 
Version: 1.0 
 
 
  
Page 5/9 
1. INTRODUCTION  
1.1 PURPOSE 
This document describes the service configuration management process. 
1.2 SCOPE 
This process is used in service management realized at 
. 
  
However, in a particular service, the service manager or the delivery manager can decide whether to 
apply this entire process or just a modified version to the service, or leave it out. 
1.3 DEFINITIONS, ACRONYMS, AND ABBREVIATIONS
